text: @PreetBharara I personally am afraid of the coronavirus.  Trump eliminated the department that handled pandemics.  The career people are gone.  I don't trust anyone he puts in place.  They are actors, not experts.  I'm also afraid of the general election, probably just as dangerous to U.S.
